summary: NPB is Japan's top baseball league, founded in 1950. It evolved from the Japanese Baseball League, which began in 1936. NPB has 12 teams split into two leagues: Central and Pacific. The Yomiuri Giants are the most successful team, winning 22 Japan Series championships. The league is very popular, ranking as the wealthiest in Asia and the second-wealthiest baseball league globally, with high attendance despite a shorter season than MLB.
title: Nippon Professional Baseball
